column4: try booting to livecd and changing the etc/fstab file on your partition to use /dev/sda1 (or whatever yours is. sudo blkid     will show you what it is) and change the UUID for that instead
if the ,ax is 1Gb and there are 2 slots then it will prbably be 2 x 512Mb
edbian, I was looking at power consumption and its around 2.5 volts,  would getting two 512mb doubles the power consumption to 5 volts?
